website_summaries.verdict: Solid replacement or spare remotes that work as well as originals for many games.
pros: Two remotes, two nunchuks, two wrist straps
Works the same as official controllers for some games
cons: Speakers are a little louder than original versions
Can take several attempts to connect

customer_reviews.title: FIRST CLASS  SELLER Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased theses remotes because my family only had two remotes and we needed 4. They came the next day as promised and we put them to the test. They feel and handle better then the Nintendo remotes. They were very easy to sync to the WIi and the Nunchuck s are awesome. Totally worth the price and works with all games played. Great Job TECHKEN
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the remote works great honestly recommend to anyone who has a wii
customer_reviews.author: Julian jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Best Price, Made from Quality Materials
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many non-Nintendo brand Wii Remote + with Nunchuk Controllers before trying to save money because New official remotes can cost you $70 still as of writing this review 3 April 2019. Then I did more searching and found these guys. Mind Blown!! Sturdy construction, ergonomic design, and custom grips and design! 4 Motion + Remotes with Shock Nunchuk controllers for under $40. You simply can't beat the deal. If you need to replace your Wii / Wii U remotes, your search stops here! A++++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Eyanla

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. They are perfect fit for any sized hands. The weight is excellent and even. Buttons are in the right places as well as perfect length. Would buy again and as a gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: SkyGuardian

customer_reviews.title: Great replacements for the original wiimotes
customer_reviews.text: These wiimotes work just as good if not better then the original remotes for the original Nintendo Wii system. I didn't great battery life because I guess it depends on what batteries you use. They look and feel great in your hand they have motion plus and I would recommend them for replacements
customer_reviews.author: Mckay2019

customer_reviews.title: Just like OEM, sound from the controller for some games also
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get rid of the garish pink and red controllers I had as well as make 4 person Mario Wii possible. These are a good buy. I've owned cheap 3rd party before and this is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Quality third party motes
customer_reviews.text: Great third party wii mote plus. Quality built, feels great, nice weight. No lag or anything weird. Also comes with nunchuck, wii mote grip, and wrist band. Nice buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dil

customer_reviews.title: Save money, buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Good controller, solid backup. Nothing too special about it. It's just another controller. Works for me the same as the ones that came with the nintendo!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Long

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My children needed replacements so they pooled their money together and purchased these. They work great! We plan to buy them another set soon.
customer_reviews.author: P. London

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive, alternative to the OEM Nintendo Nunchuk
customer_reviews.text: It works - that's all there is to it... I use eneloop rechargeable batteries and so how it "eats up" my batteries really is negligible. The only people that use it are my 6 y/o son and 4 y/o daughter so with drops, spills, etc. the control is still working.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: JUST LIKE ORIGINALS
customer_reviews.text: THESE NON-BRAND WII CONTROLLERS ARE JUST LIKE ORIGINAL NINTENDO WII BRAND. THEY WORK WELL, LOOK THE SAME, BUT COST LESS. WII CONTROLLERS ARE STILL EXPENSIVE, SO THESE WILL DO YOU JUST FINE
customer_reviews.author: TRACY RUCH

customer_reviews.title: Add another controller and nunchuck to your Nintendo Wii Fit system
customer_reviews.text: These devices (Wii Fit controller and nunchuck) work exactly like, and interoperable with the devices I got with my Wii Fit system a long time ago and allow me to interact with my grandkids using the second set. The original equipment is hard to find so it’s good to know there are still reliable alternatives available.
customer_reviews.author: D L Martin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased several Wii remotes for my daughter to use on her Wii system with friends at college. Unfortunately, two of the controllers had some minor issues which prevented them from fully working properly. I worked with Lee at TechKen who was amazing in helping me troubleshoot and then when we could not fix the existing remotes, he facilitated a very quick and painless replacement and everything works perfectly now. He was truly dedicated and diligent in making everything ok. I have a very happy daughter now! I would highly recommend this provider.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Midgley

customer_reviews.title: Works EVEN BETTER than one I bought from Nintendo!
customer_reviews.text: Connected with ease, and silkily glided the icon across the screen faster than Nintendo brand! The box came with a truly charming business card about the company that made the experience more interpersonal, an amazing touch that touched me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present hit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for our grandson’s birthday as per his request. Actually bought two so he and a friend could play together. He is thrilled with the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K

customer_reviews.title: Perform as expected.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be a solid product. My grandkids gave them a solid workout and they performed flawlessly. The price struck me as very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: lbartman

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: THE BUTTONS ARE NOT THE SAME AS NINTENDO
customer_reviews.text: if you plan to use a skin with this remote be warned the power button is on the wrong side it is on the top front left the nintendo brand is on the top front right and the - and + buttons are a tiny bit too close to the front top skins like the one that comes with the wii for wiimotes does not align nor does it match the silicone skin do not purchase if you plan to use any kind of grip skin or anything that goes around the wiimote there are buttons that will not match
customer_reviews.author: JSG

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well for what we use it for(super mario bros)
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well for what we use it for(super mario bros). But it has a tendency to not work well when pointing it at the sensor and selecting things that way. When that happens I have to take the batteries out and put them back in to reset it and then it will work. So in conclusion, it works but not how you'd want it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel  Schiavo

customer_reviews.title: Look around some more before buying
customer_reviews.text: This remote is definitely not the best option out there. I just got it today, and the first thing I notice as I turn it on is the audio. The audio that comes from this remote sounds very cheap. It sounds like it was left in a pool of water and the water ruined the speakers, leaving the audio with a very glitchy/cheap sound. That’s my biggest issue with the remote. It also feels like a cheap plastic, you can definitely tell that it isn’t a Nintendo brand. It sometimes can lag while playing a game. In summary, I would look around some more before settling on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S.

customer_reviews.title: Seems alright
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it would work well on a Wii. I bought it for use on my PC and can't get it to connect for some reason but it's nothing to do with the remote, it's something I can't figure out on my game settings. My computer recognizes it as a Wii remote using a bluetooth dongle. Since I can't figure out how to get it working, I can't provide feedback on it other than the feel and quality, both feel nice. Not what you'd expect quality wise compared to a real nintendo Wiimote, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Expensive remotes that quickly fail
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these one of the nunchucks did not work. Now a few weeks later both nunchucks do not work and both remotes constantly lose connection to the WII. I contacted the seller about the first failed nunchuck and was told I would have to reorder and send everything from the first order back. So much for trying to surprise my kid with enough remotes to have a family game night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great at half the price!
customer_reviews.text: The controllers showed up on time, very well packaged. Syncing them to the wii u was very simple by pressing the sync button on the wii u then the sync button on each controllers. They work just like the official controllers at a fraction of the cost. These were tested in mario cart 8 and house of the dead 3 with no issues. I would definetly recomend these controldrs to anyone with a wii or wii u. Side note they did sync up with dolphin emulator but i have not had yime for extensive testing. This was not a sponsored review nor did i receive anything in return for this review.
customer_reviews.author: The WV Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Happy kids!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had the original Wii since it was released. Now with everything closed and spending a lot of time home with the kids we got the old Wii out. I purchased some games on eBay and found out we needed new and upgraded remotes. These arrived today, the set up quickly and super easy. We are now playing any and all the games we have. Happy kids!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: About as good as can be expected from off brand controllers. They don't seem to be quite as accurate as the Nintendo brand,but the built in speaker (when it works) is a nice feature. It doesn't play all the sounds from the TV (it's not supposed to) but playing a game like Mario party it chimes when it's your turn, the chime doesn't always work and the speakers sound like they are blown out. All in all for the price is buy them again as the issues don't actually affect the ability to play games
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very poor Wii U sensor reception/performance compared to OEM.
customer_reviews.text: Did not track at all like a standard Nintendo OEM Wii Remote. Very spotty/jerky reception compared to another (Nintendo) Wiimote at the same time. Brand new Amazon brand Alkaline batteries, too. Item came a bit crudely packaged in such a way it seemed like a prior return but I can't be sure. The remote connects fine using the usual method of pressing the sync buttons on the controller and the base system but the reception/accuracy is intolerably bad.
customer_reviews.author: BillzillaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: 1 good 1 bad
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2. One works great, the other loses its connection with every game. It can be reset by taking the battery out and replacing it. Luckily it’s the same one that the safety strap immediately broke under the weight of the controller. The other works great and is a great value. We will see how the return/replacement process goes.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Y.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The remote feels great. The look and the feel are both on point. The problem was that it didn't work. Put batteries in, synced the remote, turned it on. It worked for about 5 seconds before it stopped registering a cursor, the lights started flickering like the LED circuitry was dying and the vibration motor turned on at full strength. I pulled the batteries out, gave it a few minutes, put the batteries back in, and the vibration started up the instant the battery circuit completed. Sent back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Caution if you get these
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we don’t use these a lot, just a handful of times since we got them a few months ago. Today was the first time my kids used the nunchucks and we were very disappointed to find they didn’t work. When looking at them several wires had been severed at the insertion of the cord into the controller. I initially was a little upset with my kids but then looking at the wires more closely the breaks were straight cuts not a break from being pulled on or abused. My advice, if you do buy these inspect them closely when you get them. We got four total and two of them have the exact same problem
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Horkley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this junk
customer_reviews.text: These products have been used for less than a week now. They were purchased as alternatives to the more expensive Nintendo controllers because they were described as great replacements. We have found them to be very unreliable and low quality. One of the nunchucks has already broken and the controllers do not respond to motion actions like they should. We needed a third controller and purchased an actual Nintendo brand, and it works so much better. We are ready to trash these cheap knockoffs and buy a reliable brand. Don’t waste your money on these junk controllers. You will only be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Gorrell

customer_reviews.title: size and sync issues
customer_reviews.text: The Wii remote syncs nicely with the game system, but the nunchuck was probably made for bigger hands. After using the original nunchuck for quite some time, the feel is different and may be tiring to hold after playing a while. update: After using the remote for a week, it starts to flicker and does not sync with the wii. I had to take out the battery several times to make it work again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Tal

customer_reviews.title: They work, but they are laggy
customer_reviews.text: These controllers connected to our Wii with no problem, and they do work. Unfortunately, they lag, and my kids couldn't stand them. I contacted the seller, and was told that's a known problem with this controller, and they refunded my money. Great service, but if the product was great, I wouldn't have needed the service!
customer_reviews.author: W. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Broke after few months
customer_reviews.text: I brought it only to play skyward sword on Wii U and didn’t want to pay over $60 for original Wii controllers. It worked good at first. But after a few months, it keeps disconnecting from Wii U. It can get annoying. In the middle of intensive boss fight, the last thing you would want to do is keep re-connecting the controller. And then suddenly one day, it completely broke and can’t be connected to Wii U at all. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed loose wires
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2 pack of the motion plus controllers. The controller part works ok but both of the nunchuck parts constantly stop working. Either it disconnects and the game stops until you can jiggle the wire enough for it to reconnect or the character you are controlling will just start running in one direction and you cant controle it any more. It's just poorly constructed I only used them both for 5 min b4 they stopped working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great price & so far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that an off-brand remote might not work well or be worth it, even at a good price, but so far I'm very impressed. Paying less for two motion remotes and nunchucks than I would for one motion remote actually made by Nintendo is wonderful! The only complaint I have over the product itself is that the sound quality is poor. Even on the lowest setting the sound was really bad. I had to turn it off completely. It only matters for a few games that require the sound, so it is more than worth the trade off! I liked the note that came from the sellers - it was a nice touch. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value you can ever get from a third-party Wii remote. It comes with built in Wii MotionPlus, just as good as the Nintendo Wii remotes. This easily synced up to my Wii, and it works just as good as the official Wii remotes I have. There are also a few problems, though. Sometimes in the motion-sensitive games, it tells me that I don't have the MotionPlus and I have to insert the MotionPlus extension to continue. If you are willing to buy a new Wii remote, but if you don't want to spend so much money on a good controller, then this is the Wii remote for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjit Shankaran

customer_reviews.title: Better to spend the money on official controller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these so my family could play together. Unfortunately they disconnect frequently and the motion plus needs to be recalibrated about every 2 minutes making them very annoying to use. Also, the sensitivity is poor compared to the official wiimotes that we own. Overall, I tried to go cheap by purchasing these and I paid for it. Again, I have 4 of these and they are all poor quality. If I could do it over I would spend the money on Nintendo products instead as these are painful to use. They do the bare minimum so I would only purchase these if you have no other choice.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A

customer_reviews.title: Good Wii or Wiiu remotes
customer_reviews.text: Good replacements or additions to any Wii or Wii-u. Great for those of us who didn't realize you have to have separate Wii notes for every player for super Mario party. Pro controllers wont work. All in all good controllers. Can be finicky to connect to Wii-u but after a try or 2 they work fine. Battery life is good to very good. Feel a little lighter and thus cheaper than the originals but not too bad. Also includes nunchuck which is very light but works fine. Cant go wrong with these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Falconbury

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Keeps getting disconnected I cannot return it because I'm out of the return time frame shouldn't buy the Worked well when it did Update 1/11/2019 Now its even draining the batteries while not being used. have to replace batteries every couple of days of no use. New batteries every time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hero

customer_reviews.title: Great Wiimote+ (not without its flaws unfortunately)
customer_reviews.text: Pro(s): -Great value (if you're looking for a cheaper Wiimote) -Built-in MotionPlus works as it should -Wiimote itself works fine Con(s): -The Nunchuk completely immobilizes any Wiimote it's attached to (my version anyway) Personal nitpicks: -Has a literal split-second delay -Wiimote speaker is decent (a little bit off in sound quality but works) Conclusion: -If you're looking for a cheaper Wiimote with the built-in MotionPlus, this is the one for you (can't guarantee the Nunchuk though as per my version).
customer_reviews.author: Bert S.

customer_reviews.title: Almost as accurate as my actual wii remotes
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got them connected to my wii My wii is 8 yrs old also. The accuracy is about 90% equal to my actual wii remotes. Can’t comment on battery life but I’m thinking it will be equal to my wii remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dufour

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2. Seemed to work fine, but after 5 minutes they reset and wouldn't resync. Customer service was extremely helpful and sent out 2 new controllers. The two replacements lasted 3 days before doing the same thing. This would be a one star review, but was extremely pleased with the lengths customer service went to try to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It works for about three minutes then just decides the go left. You have to pause the game and take out the battery on the controller. Then put it back in and proceed. It’s an inconvenience that isn’t worth the purchase. I wouldn’t recommend this purchase to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: G Tyler Mills

customer_reviews.title: These bring new life to an old family game
customer_reviews.text: The Wii was a great game for the whole family. When the kids dug it out and wanted to use it again we could not find the controllers. We ended up getting 4 of these and it was like old times. These work great and are holding up very well!
customer_reviews.author: JStine

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Sensors don't work and fail calibration test every time. Buttons are extremely laggy and make it imposible to play games like new super mario bros wii. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Issues with staying connected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for wii u. Had trouble getting it to pair. After we got it paired, it kept loosing connection through out playing. Will be returning doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these in August 2019 and three months later neither of them work. The original ones by Nintendo still work great after three years. I should’ve brought the real thing. They both quit working just after they return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Batteries keep dying
customer_reviews.text: This went through batteries within 1 day, as though the remote is not turning off after use. The cover is also made of cheap flimsy materials. I don't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This control feels a little too flimsy. While playing Nintendo Land, the wii mote kept disconecting, even on a full battery. It works fine other than the constant disconecting. Nunchuck works good. I think you're better off buying a licensed Nintendo wii mote plus
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought broken and they wouldn’t take it back
customer_reviews.text: I could never get them to work the light never came on and when I asked for a refund they told me to get bent!
customer_reviews.author: rockerjon

customer_reviews.title: One works one doesn't work that well
customer_reviews.text: They are really hard to get synced but will sync to Wii it just takes a bit of patience. One won't stay synced to Wii but works great when it is. The other one works great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brenegan

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Wii revived!!
customer_reviews.text: They're a bit different from the original (design wise). But work exactly the same!! Happy purchase. I revived my Wii once again!!! Go Mario!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: If I could give these a zero I would one controller did not work at all the second controller worked for one day even the numb Chuck would not work I also noticed after I purchased this that the supplier raise the price $10
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m gonna be honest they are not as accurate as real wii remotes came extremely late as well but overall they are alright
customer_reviews.author: Austin T Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Bought as a gift for my sister/family. We've been playing more Wii games because of them, and the controllers don't have any problem syncing up with the console, the buttons all work, the motion sensor works amazing, and you can tell it works better than the controller that came with the original console. Speakers on controllers work great as well. Overall just no problems and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Z.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Works great on our wii u
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great on our wii u. It was packaged nicely, and I received it when it said I would. I would buy this aagin from this seller if I needed too.Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina smith

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: This remote paired well with my WiiU at first and then after one use it started to just turn off as if the batteries had died but the batteries were brand new. I’m not sure why that happened but it just stopped working mid-game and we tested it on several games different times. Same result. I feel like I wasted $20. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Day 1: Just re-setup my wii, bought this controller for it. Synced fine and seemed fine till I got a second person with an official remote. Would not track properly and seemed to be perpendicular to my actual movement. Day 2: Remote pointer won't display, tried resyncing and it wouldn't resync for 5 tires. The pointer is still broken. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Software Development Executive

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: They turn off for no reason in the middle of using it. They don’t keep charge. I put new batteries in it and a day later, they were dead. My chargeable batteries do not keep charge either. The nunchucks mess up as well. Should’ve paid full price for them at GameStop. I can’t even use them anymore. I’m throwing them away and buying new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed was included. Works great. I use for Wii not Wii U. Works better then the OEM controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael g.

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as posted but I have been having ...
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as posted but I have been having issues with it since I got it. Keeps shutting off all the time during games
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Great Wii Controllers
customer_reviews.text: We needed 2 more controllers for family game night and these work perfectly for less money. Can't beat that! Good sound, vibration, and synced up easily with our system.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Kollman

customer_reviews.title: Good store
customer_reviews.text: I like both the product and the store that sent it, the card they put in the box seems like they care. Its a controller for the wii I bought
customer_reviews.author: Noodle

customer_reviews.title: It works great, and I received it fast!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to first say it was nice to receive a "Thank You" card inside my box from Olivia and Lee the owners of TechKen. It was very thoughtful. I really like my Wii controller and the nunchuck. I bought it to play games with my son. He actually liked my purchase so much he wanted to switch me controllers.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Quality Products
customer_reviews.text: The remote works like a charm. They even threw in a remote holster for shooting games for free, and emailed to make sure I was happy with the product. That’s quality customer service and products right there, I wish them the best.
customer_reviews.author: Don Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Everything as promised.
customer_reviews.text: We received the extra WII controllers on time and in great condition. They were well-packaged and worked great with our system. The kids are having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Non-functional IR Sensor
customer_reviews.text: Initial motion sensing was sub-par (jerky, imprecise), and after ~2 days of use it stopped working altogether. Went through all online troubleshooting guides I could find to make sure it wasn't the game console, sensor bar, batteries, etc. - the problem definitely lies with the internal IR sensor. The buttons still work, but the motion sensor is completely non-functional. Cheap knockoff product that does not work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Macfarlane

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking controllers that don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Nice design but they won’t stay paired, they burn though batteries, and after a few months they become fully unusable.
customer_reviews.author: David Bates

customer_reviews.title: Not A Real Controller
customer_reviews.text: Comparing this with the one original controller I have (8 years old) it's sluggish in it's response and almost unusable (all I tried it on was MarioKart; maybe the point and click response is better. I thought my new Girlfriend was just really bad at the game until we swapped controllers and this thing is worthless; noticeably worse than an 8 YEAR OLD CONTROLLER that came with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this instead of Nintendo ones, it's better
customer_reviews.text: This after market wii note is better than original nintendo hardware for once.
customer_reviews.author: SadSephiroth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfectly with my nintendo wii. The quality is excellent, I ordered two remotes and I have no complaints about it. I highly recommend and I will surely purchase from this seller again. Delivery was very fast too! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Velez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re on a budget this is perfect, works great with games that need the motion plus like Wii Sports Resort, and you get what you pay for. The speaker is a little loud but other than that it’s as good as any other third party wiimote, I was a little surprised about the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seraph

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work
customer_reviews.text: This remote would not connect to the Wii after following the very brief directions it came with. There was an email address for customer support that said one could get immediate assistance at customerservice@techkensz.com, however, this request was not responded to even after 3 days. I would not buy this item as there is no one to help you if it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan R

customer_reviews.title: Not bad - but not near as good as the original controllers.
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are not as tight as the originals, but they seem to work okay.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Just Average
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the original Nintento remote. Occasionally skips.
customer_reviews.author: Naushad Ali

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a while,  now doesn't register as being connected.
customer_reviews.text: I lost my other Wii attachment in the florence flood, so thankful for replacement parts. This has already stopped working, my original worked for some 15yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really bad product... if you are lucky ine would work properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these controllers and only one works almost properly. The other one is terrible, works only for few seconds then it turns off or starts rotating and doing anything but what what you want. Cheap stuff is usually mlre expensive at the end. I don't recommend this product at all. I hadn't had the chance to play before and now i can't even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are aftermarket remotes that have a noticeable delay while using. I would not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: A great replacement option

customer_reviews.title: That there will be no issues or extra secret fees upon checkout.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well. I just connected it this morning and I sync it and the motions work very well I played smash brothers on wii and Mario kart and resident evil 4 all with no issues will buy a 2nd controller soon. Very soon.

customer_reviews.title: Game control
customer_reviews.text: Kids like them. They have played the wii a lot more during the cohvid.

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend these.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work / had to return
customer_reviews.text: These remotes did not work unless you were sitting directly in front of Wii and stayed super still. Would constantly disconnect and ruin the game we were playing. I returned them and purchased some refurbished remotes that were actual Wii brand, and have had no problems since.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Controllers don't sync to Wii U
customer_reviews.text: One of the controllers has never worked with the Wii U despite following ALL steps on the Nintendo support forum. The battery life is not great and at the recommended 3-10 feet from the sensor bar, sometimes doesn't pick up the signal.

customer_reviews.title: Bad value
customer_reviews.text: Did not pair easily at first now will not pair at all
customer_reviews.author: JW Ideas

customer_reviews.title: Immediate problems and they're going right back to the seller.
customer_reviews.text: Immediate problems with them and I'm returning them asap. Batteries wouldn't stay in place with the back on. I even Tried taping them in and that didn't work. They disconnected from the wii every 20 seconds so there's no way to continuously play a game. Very cheap plastic as well. There's no way I would ever pay $40 for these again. In my opinion they aren't even worth the cost to ship.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley w

customer_reviews.title: No.

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought two remotes. One stopped working after two weeks. No longer will connect to the console or stay on. I expect these remotes to last longer than that. Hopefully they will replace the broken remote for me, as the other one works great. If so, I will update my review.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless

customer_reviews.title: Probably won’t get another
customer_reviews.text: It synced up finally after multiple attempts. It intermittently will lose connection. We have 3 remotes synced. 2 remotes are originally and they work fine. When pressing the down button it makes contact with the side buttons therefore whatever game you are playing is extra challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: This works just as good or better than the original one from Nintendo. Has a lot of power for tennis and boxing. I will be purchasing another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: C. King

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for emulating games on a computer. It connects fairly easy. Although the controller feels flimsy and cheap the silicone case is quite good. All in all I'd definitely buy this product again for myself or as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bennett

product_meta.title: 2 Pack Wii Remote with Wii Motion Plus Inside | Shock Wii Nunchuk Controller | Compatible Nintendo Wii, Wii U
product_meta.description:
Color:New White-2pcsTechKen Designed Wii Remote Controller With Motion Plus Inside & Nunchuk (Color Black, 2 Set Controllers & Nunchuk inside)

▲ All buttons are tested to be correct and match Nintendo Wii/ Wii u console.
▲ Whole set high performance with shaking motion plus built-in & nunchuk included. No need extra costs on motion plus or nunchuk. 
▲ EASY SYNC STEPS 
Push the small button on the controller (where the batteries go) then push the red button on the Wii console (under the little door), then you’re able to synchronize with Nintendo Wii.
▲ Powered by AA batteries, AA batteries are not included.

【 Authorization Notes 】

Only buying from TechKen will be ensured 90 days warranty, or 1 year with extended warranty. TechKen never sells products on condition of “almost new” or any second hands, or other other brands

Package Included:
2 x Wii Remote Controller (with built-in motion plus)
2 x Nunchuk Controller
2 x Strap
feature_bullets: -- It’s a must-try Wii controller if you’re looking for third party Wii remote Nunchuk Controller. All buttons are tested to be correct and match Nintendo Wii/ Wii u console. You’ll find it’s worry-free purchasing with TechKen 90 days Warranty -- but only for orders from TechKen.

-- High performance with shaking motion plus built-in & nunchuk included. No need to buy extra motion plus or a nunchuk controller, you’ll find TechKen wii controller will shake when you’re hitting something on gaming. When plug Nunchuk, it’s able to function thumb stick and triggers.

-- EASY SYNC STEPS -- Push the small button on the controller (where the batteries go) then push the red button on the Wii console (under the little door), then you’re able to synchronize with Nintendo Wii.
-- Powered by AA batteries, AA batteries are not included.
-- IMPORTANT NOTE: Cannot fit in accessories, such as Wii zapper gun.
